tool_input.old_string:
[wsl2]
swap=33856421888
memory=32GB
processors=18
localhostForwarding=true
kernelCommandLine=systemd.unified_cgroup_hierarchy=1

[experimental]
# Enable GUI applications with hardware acceleration
guiApplications=true
# Use native Windows GPU drivers for better performance
gpuSupport=true
# Disable virtualized GPU for direct access
useWindowsOpenGL=false
# Enable Direct3D 12 for NVIDIA GPU
d3d12=true
# Sparse VHD for better disk usage
sparseVhd=true
# Auto memory reclaim
autoMemoryReclaim=gradual
tool_input.new_string:
[wsl2]
# Memory configuration
memory=32GB
swap=32GB
swapfile=%USERPROFILE%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\swap.vhdx

# CPU configuration
processors=18

# Network settings
localhostForwarding=true
networkingMode=mirrored
firewall=true
dnsTunneling=true
autoProxy=true

# Kernel settings
kernelCommandLine=systemd.unified_cgroup_hierarchy=1

[experimental]
# Memory management
sparseVhd=true
autoMemoryReclaim=gradual

# Network improvements
hostAddressLoopback=true
bestEffortDnsParsing=true

tool_response.originalFile:
[wsl2]
swap=33856421888
memory=32GB
processors=18
localhostForwarding=true
kernelCommandLine=systemd.unified_cgroup_hierarchy=1

[experimental]
# Enable GUI applications with hardware acceleration
guiApplications=true
# Use native Windows GPU drivers for better performance
gpuSupport=true
# Disable virtualized GPU for direct access
useWindowsOpenGL=false
# Enable Direct3D 12 for NVIDIA GPU
d3d12=true
# Sparse VHD for better disk usage
sparseVhd=true
# Auto memory reclaim
